subject: Horse Racing
Triple Crown (Horse Racing)
American Pharoah (Race Horse)
lead_paragraph: It appears the early leaders in the sweepstakes to have the Triple Crown winner American Pharoah appear at their racetracks are Monmouth Park in New Jersey and Saratoga in upstate New York.
snippet: It appears the early leaders in the sweepstakes to have the Triple Crown winner American Pharoah appear at their racetracks are Monmouth Park in New Jersey and Saratoga in upstate New York.
